title: Develop Custom Integration Script
description: A customer needs a custom script to sync data between the product and their homegrown CRM system.

tasks.description: Review the API documentation for both products to understand the required endpoints and data formats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant fully understands the technical requirements for the integration.

tasks.description: Write a Python script that calls the APIs to pull data from the CRM and push it to the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant develops a functional script that meets the requirements.

tasks.description: Test the script in a staging environment and then deploy it for the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The script is successfully deployed and data begins to sync correctly.
